title: ERG Community of Practice-Based Learning Facilitation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational learning activities
context.additional_context: Curriculum design applying the Community of Practice (CoP) approach to ERG's learning facilitation role in the mathematics domain, implemented via smartphone-centered activities in resource-constrained technical environments

learning_goals: Explain at least three core mechanisms by which ERG functions as a community of practice (CoP) to build learning environments
Design a knowledge-sharing system among ERG members using mobile devices
Develop a project evaluation rubric to measure the outcomes of ERG-based learning activities

resources: ERG (Employee Resource Group) Case Study Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
